skills.name: OAuth2 Flows
skills.pattern: Auth Code + PKCE pour SPA, Client Credentials pour M2M

skills.name: OAuth2 Scopes
skills.pattern: scope: 'read:users write:posts openid profile email'

skills.name: Refresh Tokens
skills.pattern: Access: 15min, Refresh: 7d, Rotation on use

skills.name: Token Storage
skills.pattern: httpOnly cookie (XSS safe) > memory > localStorage (XSS vulnerable)

skills.name: OpenID Connect
skills.pattern: ID Token (JWT) + UserInfo endpoint

skills.name: ID Token Claims
skills.description: sub, iss, aud, exp, iat, nonce
skills.pattern: Toujours valider: signature, iss, aud, exp, nonce

skills.name: Discovery Document
skills.pattern: authorization_endpoint, token_endpoint, jwks_uri

skills.name: JWT Structure
skills.pattern: base64url(header).base64url(payload).signature

skills.name: JWT Validation
skills.pattern: Verify sig with public key, check exp, iss, aud

skills.name: JWT Best Practices
skills.pattern: exp: 15min, pas de PII dans payload, use JWE si necessaire

skills.name: JWT Revocation
skills.pattern: Redis blacklist, ou tokens courts + refresh rotation

skills.name: SAML Basics
skills.pattern: IdP (identity), SP (service), SAML Assertion

skills.name: SAML vs OIDC
skills.pattern: SAML: legacy enterprise. OIDC: moderne, mobile-friendly

skills.name: TOTP
skills.pattern: Google Authenticator, 6 digits, 30s window

skills.name: WebAuthn
skills.pattern: navigator.credentials.create(), biometrics, security keys

skills.name: SMS OTP
skills.pattern: Vulnerable SIM swap, backup option seulement

skills.name: Password Hashing
skills.pattern: Argon2id prefere, bcrypt cost 12+, JAMAIS MD5/SHA1

skills.name: Password Policy
skills.pattern: Min 12 chars, check breached passwords (HaveIBeenPwned)

skills.name: Password Reset
skills.pattern: Random token, expire 1h, single use, notify user

skills.name: Session Management
skills.pattern: Random session ID, httpOnly, Secure, SameSite=Strict

skills.name: Session Fixation
skills.pattern: req.session.regenerate() apres authentification

skills.name: RBAC
skills.pattern: User -> Roles -> Permissions. if (user.hasRole('admin'))

skills.name: ABAC
skills.pattern: if (user.department === resource.department && user.clearance >= resource.level)

skills.name: ReBAC
skills.pattern: user:alice is owner of doc:readme -> check tuple

skills.name: API Keys
skills.pattern: Header: X-API-Key. Hash stored, prefix for lookup

skills.name: API Key Rotation
skills.pattern: Support 2 active keys pendant transition

skills.name: Signed Requests
skills.pattern: signature = HMAC-SHA256(secret, method + path + timestamp + body)

skills.name: Brute Force Protection
skills.pattern: 5 fails -> 15min lockout, progressive delays, CAPTCHA

skills.name: Credential Stuffing
skills.pattern: Rate limit per IP, device fingerprinting, breach detection

skills.name: Account Enumeration
skills.pattern: Same response for valid/invalid email on reset
